SEARCH
Package net.tangly.ui.app.domain

Interface Cmd

All Known Implementing Classes:
CmdFilesUpload
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface Cmd
The interface defines the abstraction for the command pattern. A command is an action mostly executed through the user interface as a client. A command is an object whose role is to store all the information required for executing an action, including the method to call, the method arguments, and the object (known as the receiver) that implements the method.

  • Method Details

    • ofItemCmd

      static <T> void ofItemCmd(@NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.grid.contextmenu.GridContextMenu.GridContextMenuItemClickEvent<T> event, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<T> consumer)
      Factory method to create a command from a grid context menu item click event. The command is executed on the item selected in the grid. An item must be selected to trigger the command.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the item
      Parameters:
      event - grid context menu item click event
      consumer - consumer to execute the command

    • ofGlobalCmd

      static void ofGlobalCmd(@NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.grid.contextmenu.GridContextMenu.GridContextMenuItemClickEvent<?> event, @NotNull @NotNull Runnable consumer)
      Factory method to create a command from a grid context menu item click event. The command is executed if no item is selected in the grid.
      Parameters:
      event - grid context menu item click event
      consumer - consumer to execute the command

    • ofDualCmd

      static <T> void ofDualCmd(@NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.grid.contextmenu.GridContextMenu.GridContextMenuItemClickEvent<T> event, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<T> consumer)
      Factory method to create a command from a grid context menu item click event. The command is executed if one or no items are selected in the grid. The consumer receives the selected item in the grid or null if no item is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - grid context menu item click event
      consumer - consumer to execute the command

    • execute

      void execute()
      Execute the command.

    • createDialog

      static com.vaadin.flow.component.dialog.Dialog createDialog(String width, com.vaadin.flow.component.formlayout.FormLayout form)

    • isEnabled

      default boolean isEnabled(boolean itemSelected)
      Return true if the command is enabled. The criteria are if an item is selected in the grid and the access rights associated with the user profile.
      Parameters:
      itemSelected - true if an item is selected in the grid
      Returns:
      true if the command is enabled, otherwise false

    • dialog

      default com.vaadin.flow.component.dialog.Dialog dialog()
      Return the dialog associated with the command if existing.
      Returns:
      associated dialog if defined othwrwise null
